name: Sometimes you get stuck together with magic goo
name_original: Sometimes you get stuck together with magic goo
description:
When going on an adventure you and your companion got stuck together back-to-back with some magic goo. Working together make your way through the dungeon.

Can be played with
-Just a keyboard
-Keyboard and 1 Xbox 360 (or similar?) controller
-2 Xbox 360 (or similar?) controllers

Controls are printed at on the title screen.

In order for the player to move or rotate, both players must move in the same direction at the same time.

Players are able to attack independent of one another.

Touch the swirling purple warp to progress to the next screen.
If you die the current room resets.
Press Esc to close the game.
